title: Client Crash and Bug Splat
body: 2nd time this week the "client" has crashed and been "repaired". Another ranked game screwed bc of this. Client crashes just now and it is getting "repaired" for the 5th time on the same bug splat! What the hell am I to do?! Last report I made got ignored so sorry if I sound a bit pissed off in this one.

replies.body:
Sounds like some of those game files aren't being installed or even repaired properly. Sometimes it's caused by not having the right permission settings in place, other times it can actually be caused by certain firewall and antivirus. At this point with it crashing so often on you, I'd like to have you go ahead and grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with both **Reinstall and Clean Uninstall** checked. Make sure you install and run the HRT as admin as well.

If that's not helping, keep talking with the tech agents in your ticket. They'll be able to dig through your logs to see what might be going wrong in your ticket.

Completely uninstalled the game and reinstalled it to see if this works (currently another  30 mins of patching left)

What am I to do about getting the hard LP loss just outside of promos (trying to get gold b4 the 7th). This is the 4th game this past 2 weeks I was dc'd because of this issue. It happens at random, not like it was every game.

Update: The reinstall is letting me play again, but FPS are dropping mid game (which is god awful playing a skill shot based champ) 

Is there a issue with the last update that Riot is keeping hush-hush. Screw me getting to gold this season! I got another leaverbuster bc of this game. I can have my gaming laptop on all day with no issues until this last patch. 

It literally shuts off my comp and i have to reboot and log in. Once in champ select and 4 times during a game! It only shuts off when the game is running and nothing else.
I can play World of Tanks or other games just fine, but this one is screwing up hard. What the hell is going on? Am I being Trolled?
Client patches..says to restart client. restart. another patching, gets this (Error code 004). Asked to restart client (again)..and the loop goes on!
Did a full repair from the "gear" menu (2 times) and the same issue. Getting the error 004 and the message saying they don't know what is wrong. Same loop. Is this patch causing issues??
Now I get a LEAVER -Remake on the game and go from 97LP to 75! One game from promos and I get dicked bc of the system and game itself..unreal
I was in a duo for that game too..they had to remake bc the game would NOT fix
I had played games just fine before this one today.
